attributes.review: After the extremely long download time (which could be due to the lack of storage I have on my phone so I’m not tripping over this), I found my social media accounts hacked and saved credit card info being used in Russia... I’m disappointed to say the least.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER COMING FROM A TRUMP SUPPORTER

attributes.review: Poorly made, doesn’t let me long in, the background picture has very back quality making it look like there is something hanging from his neck, nose looking a little crooked, and it keeps loving me out of the app not letting me support our dear president 💔
attributes.title: Fake news

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to watch tiktok but this man really trying to take it away from us like how can you do such a thing, I mean what’s quarantine with out tiktok, so you’re Trying to take away tiktok so we can actually go outside and die by corona unbelievable I’ll give this a 1 star review. 

  THANK YOU FIR YOUR TIME
attributes.title: What a FRICKEN RIP OFF😡

attributes.review: This app is hot garbage. Like literally. Filled with absolute FAKE NEWS. I’m so sick of these spam, ad filled apps that literally crash your phone. Not to go full Karen mode but I demand this app get take down. This is a waste of space and quite honestly, a pile of poopy on a hot summer day. My mom disowned me because of this app. Good DAY ✨🧚🏻
attributes.title: Trash trash trash!!!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD. MISLEADING FAKE NEW. THIS IS A BIDEN APP

attributes.review: As soon as I open this app it asked me for my phone number then I started getting a bunch of spam calls from scary old men then when I got off the phone I had my camera keep opening and taking random pictures I rate it zero stars terrible DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
attributes.title: Bad vibes

attributes.review: I have never been more disappointed in an app! Out of the history of all apps, there has never been a more universally awful app. 10/10 would NOT recommend to anyone! This app has already ruined the lives of an uncountable number of individuals. Absolutely HATEFUL.
attributes.title: A DISGRACE🤭🤢🤮

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support my AMAZING president🤩 as soon as i got into the app the i immediately got a virus on my phone now my phone is starting to die randomly even when it’s at 100% clicking and all my photos are missing honestly if o could give zero stars i would😤
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP TERRIBLE

attributes.review: since downloading this dreadful app i have been constantly waking up to a homophobic and misogynistic orange monster by the foot of my bed and do NOT recommend downloading no matter the circumstances! pls spread the word to keep this from happening to anyone else bc i wish no orange scaly monster on anyone.
attributes.title: this app gave me sleep paralysis

attributes.review: Not sure why this app is #1 in news when it is full of 🐂💩 shouldn’t have been able to get onto my phone in the first place but now it’s compromising all my phone’s democratic principles! Very unfriendly to user—actually quite a bully.
attributes.title: Faulty and full of misinformation
